nodes.bodyText: Seems like it should be, yeah. This should probably be fixed with the 1.3.0 release so you don't risk doing 2 consecutive breaking changes releases. That being said, it's unrelated to this PR so I won't fix it here.
Sounds good. We should just remember to fix it in 1.3.0. Maybe it's time we document the coming breaking changes somewhere so we don't forget anything...
